user_request: A romantic poem about two hearts beating as one.
final_poem:
Two pulses merged in love's sweet fire,
A symphony of heartbeats, never to tire.
In syncopated rhythm, they dance and play,
Echoing each other, night and day.

Their beats entwined like vines on a trellis high,
In perfect harmony, they touch the sky.
Within this rhythm, their love will forever be,
A duet of hearts that beat as one, wild and free.
